a: As in right now? I make stuff.
I also do certifications (so I can get a job).
I’m also a big fan of motorsports and cars.
And I compete in hackathons (coding competitions).
As of writing, I’m an incoming college freshman that’s participated in multiple CS opportunities such as internships, hackathons, CTFs, and even a robotics competition.
If you mean technologies, I do Python, Java, and Javascript, with a little bit of C++.
Also, I built this website with ReactJS.

qa.q: What inspired you to get to where you are? Why do you focus on such things?
a: Playing video games from the computer made me want to make my own games (which I ended up never really doing but made me retrospectively curious in the end)
<sl>Continuous, long hours of code</sl> (Just kidding I can’t do that anymore)
Learn and practice as much as I can so I can do more stuff later on in my life (which is computer engineering).
Read books, and write things down
